description:
Retro colour blocking and just the right amount of crop gives this pint-sized pullover a style all its own. Made from Patagonia’s lightest weight recycled fleece, this top is cozy, without being bulky. The ultra-soft fabric keeps small people warm for playing in winter landscapes, and it won't get bogged down with moisture or caked in heavy snow.

  • Recycled polyester microdenier fleece is lightweight, ultra-soft and quick to dry
  • Half-length zipper makes it easy to get on and off
  • Kangaroo pocket is great for keeping hands warm or stashing snacks
  • Slight crop is a little shorter than the average jumper, but not too short
  • Relaxed fit has a laid-back look, leaves room to layer, and room to grow
name: Patagonia Microdini Cropped Hoody Pullover - Girls' - Children to Youths
